author: Luc Olinga
title: Bitcoin Who? Wall Street Has a New Crypto Obsession
description: While Bitcoin hits new highs, a little-known company is capturing the imagination of investors with a simple, yet revolutionary, idea: the stablecoin.
content: For over a decade, Bitcoin has been the undisputed face of digital finance. When you think “crypto,” you think Bitcoin. Its surges and crashes have been treated as bellwethers for the entire industry… [+3123 chars]
reworded_title: "Wall Street's New Cryptocurrency Obsession: Move Over Bitcoin!"
reworded_description: As Bitcoin reaches record levels, a lesser-known company garners investor interest through their game-changing concept: the stablecoin.
reworded_content: For more than ten years, Bitcoin has reigned as the primary representative of digital finance. The term "crypto" often brings Bitcoin to mind first. Its ups and downs have been viewed as indicators of the state of the whole industry.
